global_caption: a scene featuring a grandpa with white hair wearing a black cap, a white shirt, a grey cardigan, and black long pants, with a pair of black shoes, watching a girl; a woman with dark brown, slightly tanned skin wearing a short-sleeved dress that has long small pink and light-blue flower patterns, looking front, holding hands with a male and holding a wooden basket; a dark brown, slightly tanned male with short, curly dark brown hair wearing a short-sleeve blue shirt and beige shorts, looking front, holding a bunch of bottled water; a little girl wearing a hot-pink no-sleeve t-shirt, a white mid-length skirt, and pink sandals, holding a yellow balloon in her left hand and a small brown teddy bear with black eyes in her right hand; and a road with two black cars and a lot of trees with green leaves.
